chart_description: The `mem.sync` chart monitors calls for `sync(2)` and `syncfs(2)` system calls which sync the memory with the disk. It helps to identify any potential bottlenecks due to the excessive usage of these system calls.

dimension_descriptions.sync: This dimension represents the frequency of `sync(2)` system calls which ensures that all modified data is written to the disk.
dimension_descriptions.syncfs: This dimension represents the frequency of `syncfs(2)` system calls which ensures that all data and metadata related to a mounted filesystem is written to the disk.
